typeProperties.script:
source(output(
		DateNum as integer,
		Date as timestamp 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		YearMonthNum as integer,
		YearQuaterNumber as integer,
		Calendar_Quarter as string,
		Month as string,
		MonthName as string,
		ShortMonthName as string,
		MonthOfQuarter as integer,
		WeekNum as integer,
		DayNumOfYear as integer,
		DayOfQuarter as integer,
		DayNumOfMonth as integer,
		DayNumOfWeek as integer,
		DayName as string,
		ShortDayName as string,
		WeekOfMonth as integer,
		WeekOfQuarter as integer,
		WeekOfYear as integer,
		YearNumberMonthName as string,
		YearNumberMonthNameAbbr as string,
		YearNumber as integer,
		DaysYearNumber as integer,
		LeapYearIND as string,
		FirstDayOfWeekIND as string,
		WeekBeginDate as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		Week_End_Date as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		WeekEndIND as string,
		LastDayOfWeekIND as string,
		Quarter as integer,
		DayNumOfQuarter as integer,
		FirstDayOfYear as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		LastDayOfYear as date 'dd-MM-yyyy',
		IsHolidayUSA as string,
		HolidayUSA as string
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	ignoreNoFilesFound: false) ~> SRDimDate
SRDimDate sink(input(
		DateNum as integer,
		Date as date,
		YearMonthNum as integer,
		YearQuaterNumber as integer,
		Calendar_Quarter as string,
		Month as integer,
		MonthName as string,
		ShortMonthName as string,
		MonthOfQuarter as integer,
		WeekNum as integer,
		DayNumOfYear as integer,
		DayOfQuarter as integer,
		DayNumOfMonth as integer,
		DayNumOfWeek as integer,
		DayName as string,
		ShortDayName as string,
		WeekOfMonth as integer,
		WeekOfQuarter as integer,
		WeekOfYear as integer,
		YearNumberMonthName as string,
		YearNumberMonthNameAbbr as string,
		YearNumber as integer,
		DaysYearNumber as integer,
		LeapYearIND as string,
		FirstDayOfWeekIND as string,
		WeekBeginDate as date,
		Week_End_Date as date,
		WeekEndIND as string,
		LastDayOfWeekIND as string,
		Quarter as integer,
		DayNumOfQuarter as integer,
		FirstDayOfYear as date,
		LastDayOfYear as date,
		IsHolidayUSA as boolean,
		HolidayUSA as string,
		CreationDate as timestamp,
		UpdationDate as timestamp,
		RecordCreationUserID as integer,
		RecordUpdationUserID as integer,
		ph_varchar1 as string,
		ph_varchar2 as string,
		ph_Decimal1 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_Decimal2 as decimal(10,2),
		ph_datetime1 as timestamp,
		ph_datetime2 as timestamp
	),
	allowSchemaDrift: true,
	validateSchema: false,
	deletable:false,
	insertable:true,
	updateable:false,
	upsertable:false,
	format: 'table',
	mapColumn(
		Date,
		YearMonthNum,
		YearQuaterNumber,
		Calendar_Quarter,
		Month,
		MonthName,
		ShortMonthName,
		MonthOfQuarter,
		WeekNum,
		DayNumOfYear,
		DayOfQuarter,
		DayNumOfMonth,
		DayNumOfWeek,
		DayName,
		ShortDayName,
		WeekOfMonth,
		WeekOfQuarter,
		WeekOfYear,
		YearNumberMonthName,
		YearNumberMonthNameAbbr,
		YearNumber,
		DaysYearNumber,
		LeapYearIND,
		FirstDayOfWeekIND,
		WeekBeginDate,
		Week_End_Date,
		WeekEndIND,
		LastDayOfWeekIND,
		Quarter,
		DayNumOfQuarter,
		FirstDayOfYear,
		LastDayOfYear,
		IsHolidayUSA,
		HolidayUSA
	),
	skipDuplicateMapInputs: true,
	skipDuplicateMapOutputs: true,
	errorHandlingOption: 'stopOnFirstError') ~> TRDimDate
